recipe.title: One-pan Flank Steak & Veggies Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 4 cups ; wild rice, cooked, to serve ; (920 g)

steps.step: In a small bowl, add the salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika, and onion powder. Stir until well combined.
Place broccoli, onions, and flank steak on a baking tray.
Coat broccoli and onions with olive oil.
Sprinkle seasoning mix on flank steak, broccoli, and onions until coated.
For medium, internal temperature of steak should reach 145°F (65°C). Let steak rest 10 minutes before cutting.
Serve now with wild rice or refrigerate in airtight containers up to 3-4 days.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a small bowl, add the salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika, and onion powder.
Place broccoli, onions, and flank steak on a baking tray.
Coat broccoli and onions with olive oil.
Sprinkle seasoning mix on flank steak, broccoli, and onions until coated.
For medium, internal temperature of steak should reach 145°F (65°C).
Let steak rest 10 minutes before cutting.
Serve now with wild rice or refrigerate in airtight containers up to 3-4 days.
